anya-e0906n:3_1: paṭhamamahāsaṁgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṁgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā paṭhamaṁ
anya-e0906n:3_2: vinayapiṭakaṁ saṁgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṁyuttaaṅguttarasaṁkhāte cattāro mahānikāye
anya-e0906n:3_3: saṁgāyitvā tadanantaraṁ kiṁ nāma pāvacanaṁ saṁgāyiṁsu.
anya-e0906n:4_1: paṭhamamahāsaṁgītikāle bhante dhammasaṁgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā paṭhamaṁ
anya-e0906n:4_2: vinayapiṭakaṁ saṁgāyitvā suttantapiṭake ca dīghamajjhimasaṁyuttaaṅguttarasaṁkhāte cattāro nikāye saṁgāyitvā
anya-e0906n:5_1: imissampi āvuso chaṭṭhasaṁgītiyaṁ sakalañceva vinayapiṭakaṁ saṁgītaṁ,
anya-e0906n:5_3: Kālo dāni āvuso sampatto abhidhammapiṭakaṁ saṁgāyituṁ,
anya-e0906n:5_5: Abhidhammo nāmesa āvuso kenaṭṭhena abhidhammoti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:6_0: Vissajjanā – dhammātireka dhammavisesaṭṭhena bhante abhidhammoti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:7_0: Pucchā – so panesa āvuso abhidhammo kena kattha kadā ca adhigato.
anya-e0906n:8_1: so kho bhante abhidhammo sabbaññubuddhena mahābodhimaṇḍamūle vesākhapuṇṇamiyaṁ yathābhūtaṁ adhigato.
anya-e0906n:9_0: Pucchā – kattha panesa āvuso abhidhammo bhagavatā kadā ca vicito.
anya-e0906n:10_0: Vissajjanā – so kho bhante abhidhammo bhagavatā mahābodhimaṇḍe ratanagharasattāhe vicito.
anya-e0906n:11_0: Pucchā – kattha panesa āvuso abhidhammo bhagavatā kadā kassatthāya ca desito.
anya-e0906n:12_1: so kho bhante abhidhammo bhagavatā devesu tāvatiṁsesu pāricchattakamūlamhi paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ abhisambodhito
anya-e0906n:12_2: sattame vasse mātaraṁ pamukhaṁ katvā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma sannisinnānaṁ devatānaṁ caturoghanittharaṇatthāya
anya-e0906n:13_0: Pucchā – kenesa āvuso abhidhammo paṭhamaṁ manussaloke patiggahito, kassa ca puna tena desito.
anya-e0906n:14_1: āyasmatā bhante sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā esa abhidhammo paṭhamaṁ manussaloke patiggahito,
anya-e0906n:14_2: teneva bhante āyasmatā sāriputtattherena attano saddhivihārikānaṁ pañcannaṁ bhikkhusatānaṁ desito.
anya-e0906n:16_0: Vissajjanā – sekhā ca bhante puthujjanā kalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
anya-e0906n:20_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati, te dhārenti.
anya-e0906n:22_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0906n:26_2: Tesu paṭhamaṁ bhagavatā kataraṁ pakaraṇaṁ desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:27_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhamaṁ bhante dhammasaṅgaṇipakaraṇaṁ bhagavatā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:28_3: Tesu mātikaṁ nikkhipantena bhagavatā kataṁ nikkhittā.
anya-e0906n:29_1: mātikaṁ bhante nikkhipantena bhagavatā “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā.
anya-e0906n:29_2: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā.
anya-e0906n:29_3: Vipākā dhammā vipākadhammadhammā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā”ti evamādinā dvāvīsatiyā tikānaṁ vasena.
anya-e0906n:30_1: Hetū ceva dhammā sahetukā ca sahetukā ceva dhammā na ca hetū.
anya-e0906n:30_2: Hetū ceva dhammā hetusampayuttā ca hetusampayuttā ceva dhammā na ca hetū.
anya-e0906n:30_3: Na hetū kho pana dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpī”ti evamādinā dukasatānañca vasena mātikā nikkhittā.
anya-e0906n:32_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṁ padabhājanīye cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammātipadassa atthaṁ vibhajantena
anya-e0906n:32_2: bhagavatā kathaṁ kāmāvacarakusalaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:33_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante dhammasaṅgaṇipakaraṇe cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti padassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā “katame dhammā kusalā.
anya-e0906n:33_2: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti somanassasahagataṁ ñāṇasampayuttaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0906n:33_3: vā saddārammaṇaṁ vā gandhārammaṇaṁ vā rasārammaṇaṁ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṁ vā dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ
anya-e0906n:33_5: Tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti vedanā hoti saññā hoti cetanā hoti cittaṁ hoti vitakko hoti vicāro hoti pīti
anya-e0906n:33_6: hoti sukhaṁ hoti cittassekaggatā hotī”ti evamādinā kāmāvacarakusalaṁ tīhi mahāvārehi vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:35_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷiyaṁ cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti padassa atthaṁ vibhajantena
anya-e0906n:35_2: bhagavatā kathaṁ rūpāvacarakusalañca arūpāvacarakusalañca vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:36_2: Yasmiṁ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savitakkaṁ
anya-e0906n:36_3: vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati pathavīkasiṇa”nti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:38_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷiyaṁ cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti padassa atthaṁ vibhajantena
anya-e0906n:38_2: bhagavatā kathaṁ lokuttarakusalaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:39_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṁ cittuppādakaṇḍe kusalā dhammāti padassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā “katame dhammā kusalā.
anya-e0906n:39_2: Yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi…pe…
anya-e0906n:39_3: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiñña”nti evamādinā bhagavatā lokuttarakusalaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:41_1: tattheva āvuso akusalā dhammāti mātikāpadassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṁ akusalaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:42_1: tattheva bhante akusalā dhammāti mātikāpadassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā “katame dhammā akusalā.
anya-e0906n:42_2: Yasmiṁ samaye akusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti somanassasahagataṁ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ vā
anya-e0906n:42_3: saddhārammaṇaṁ vā gandhārammaṇaṁ vā rasārammaṇaṁ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṁ vā dhammārammaṇaṁ vā yaṁ yaṁ vā
anya-e0906n:42_5: Tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti vedanā hoti saññā hoti cetanā hoti cittaṁ hotī”ti evamādinā akusalaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:44_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷiyaṁ cittuppādakaṇḍarūpakaṇḍesu abyākatā dhammāti mātikāpadassa
anya-e0906n:44_2: atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā kathaṁ abyākatā dhammā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:45_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṁ abyākatā dhammāti padassa atthaṁ vibhajantena bhagavatā “katame dhammā abyākatā.
anya-e0906n:45_2: Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṁ cakkhuviññāṇaṁ uppannaṁ hoti upekkhāsahagataṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ.
anya-e0906n:45_3: Tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti vedanā hoti saññā hoti cetanā hoti cittaṁ hotī”ti evamādinā ca cittuppādakaṇḍe,
anya-e0906n:45_5: Kusalākusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ vipākā kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarā apariyāpannā vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho.
anya-e0906n:45_6: Ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā.
anya-e0906n:45_8: Ime dhammā abyākatā”ti evamādinā ca abyākatā dhammā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:47_0: Pucchā – sattasu āvuso abhidhammappakaraṇesu vibhaṅgappakaraṇe bhagavatā kati vibhaṅgā desitā.
anya-e0906n:48_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu dutiye vibhaṅgappakaraṇe khandhavibhaṅgo āyatanavibhaṅgo dhātuvibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:48_2: saccavibhaṅgo indriyavibhaṅgo paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅgo satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgo sammappadhānavibhaṅgo iddhipādavibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:48_3: bojjhaṅgavibhaṅgo maggaṅgavibhaṅgo jhānavibhaṅgo appamaññāvibhaṅgo sikkhāpadavibhaṅgo paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:48_4: ñāṇavibhaṅgo khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo dhammahadayavibhaṅgoti bhagavatā aṭṭhārasa vibhaṅgā desitā.
anya-e0906n:50_1: tesu āvuso aṭṭhārasasu vibhaṅgesu paṭhame khandhavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ khandhā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:51_1: tesu bhante aṭṭhārasasu vibhaṅgesu paṭhame khandhavibhaṅge “pañcakkhandhā rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho.
anya-e0906n:51_3: yaṁkiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
anya-e0906n:51_4: tadekajjhaṁ abhisaññūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā ayaṁ vuccati rūpakkhandho”ti evamādinā suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:51_5: tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā khandhā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:53_1: dutiye pana āvuso āyatanavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ āyatanāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:54_1: dutiye bhante āyatanavibhaṅge “dvādasāyatanāni cakkhāyatanaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ sotāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ ghānāyatanaṁ
anya-e0906n:54_2: gandhāyatanaṁ jivhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ kāyāyatanaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manāyatanaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ.
anya-e0906n:54_4: rūpā aniccā dukkhā anattā vipariṇāmadhammā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:56_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe tatiye dhātuvibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ dhātuyo vitthārena vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:57_1: tatiye bhante dhātuvibhaṅge “cha dhātuyo pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu ākāsadhātu viññāṇadhātū”ti
anya-e0906n:59_0: Pucchā – catutthe pana āvuso saccavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ saccāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:60_1: catutthe bhante saccavibhaṅge “cattāri ariyasaccāni dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ,
anya-e0906n:60_15: tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā saccāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:62_1: pañcame pana āvuso indriyavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ indriyāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:63_1: pañcame pana bhante indriyavibhaṅge “bāvīsatindriyāni cakkhundriyaṁ sotindriyaṁ ghānindriyaṁ jivhindriyaṁ kāyindriyaṁ manindriyaṁ…pe…
anya-e0906n:63_2: aññātāvindriya”nti evamādinā abhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi dvīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā indriyāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:65_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe chaṭṭhe paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ paṭiccasamuppādo vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:66_2: samudayo hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā paṭiccasamuppādo suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyasaṅkhātehi dvīhi mahānayehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:68_1: sattame pana āvuso satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ satipaṭṭhānā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:69_1: sattame bhante satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅge “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā idha bhikkhu ajjhattaṁ kāye kāyānupassī viharati,
anya-e0906n:69_3: ajjhattabahiddhā kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa”nti
anya-e0906n:71_1: aṭṭhame pana āvuso sammappadhānavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ sammappadhānā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:72_1: aṭṭhame bhante sammappadhānavibhaṅge “cattāro sammappadhānā idha bhikkhu anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ
anya-e0906n:72_2: dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati,
anya-e0906n:72_3: uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati,
anya-e0906n:72_4: anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati,
anya-e0906n:72_5: uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṁ
anya-e0906n:72_6: janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā sammappadhānā vitthārato
anya-e0906n:74_1: navame pana āvuso iddhipādavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ iddhipādā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:75_1: navame bhante iddhipādavibhaṅge “cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti…pe…
anya-e0906n:75_2: vīmaṁsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāvetī”ti evamādinā tīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā iddhipādā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:77_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe dasame bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ bojjhaṅgā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:78_1: dasame bhante bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge “satta bojjhaṅgā satisambojjhaṅgo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo
anya-e0906n:78_4: idha bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā,
anya-e0906n:78_6: tīhi nayehi bojjhaṅgā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:80_1: ekādasame pana āvuso maggaṅgavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ maggaṅgā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:81_3: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:83_0: Pucchā – dvādasamo pana āvuso jhānavibhaṅgo bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:84_1: dvādasamo bhante jhānavibhaṅgo “idha bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu
anya-e0906n:84_2: vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū pubbarattāpararattaṁ
anya-e0906n:84_3: jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:86_1: terasame pana āvuso appamaññāvibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ appamaññāyo vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:87_1: terasame bhante appamaññāvibhaṅge “catasso appamaññāyo idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
anya-e0906n:87_5: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
anya-e0906n:87_6: appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:87_7: tīhi mahānayehi appamaññāyo vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:89_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe cuddasame sikkhāpadavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ sikkhāpadāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:90_1: cuddasame bhante sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “pañca sikkhāpadāni pāṇātipātā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṁ,
anya-e0906n:90_7: yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hoti somanassasahagataṁ ñāṇasampayuttaṁ pāṇātipātā
anya-e0906n:90_8: viramantassā”ti evamādinā abhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi dvīhi mahānayehi bhagavatā sikkhāpadāni
anya-e0906n:92_1: pannarasame pana āvuso paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ paṭisambhidāyo vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:93_1: pannarasame bhante paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge “catasso paṭisambhidā atthapaṭisambhidā dhammapaṭisambhidā niruttipaṭisambhidā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.
anya-e0906n:93_5: ñāṇesu ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā catasso paṭisambhidāyo suttantabhājanīyaabhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0906n:95_0: Pucchā – soḷasame pana āvuso ñāṇavibhaṅge bhagavatā kathaṁ ñāṇāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:96_1: soḷasame bhante ñāṇavibhaṅge “ekavidhena ñāṇavatthu pañcaviññāṇā na hetū, ahetukā,
anya-e0906n:96_4: sāsavā”ti evamādinā ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā bhagavatā ñāṇāni vitthārato vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:98_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso vibhaṅgappakaraṇe sattarasamo khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo bhagavatā kathaṁ desito.
anya-e0906n:99_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante dutiye vibhaṅgappakaraṇe sattarasamo khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgo “jātimado,
anya-e0906n:99_5: jīvitamado”ti evamādinā ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritaṁ bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:101_0: Pucchā – tattha āvuso aṭṭhārasamo dhammahadayavibhaṅgo bhagavatā kathaṁ vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:102_24: satta cittānī”ti evamādinā sabbasaṅgāhakādīhi dasahi vārehi bhagavatā vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:103_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā uppādakakammaāyuppamāṇavāro vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:104_1: dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā kattha upapajjanti.
anya-e0906n:104_3: sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā appekacce khattiyamahāsālānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjanti,
anya-e0906n:104_9: appekacce tusitānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjantīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā uppādakakammaāyuppamāṇavāro vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:108_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā aṭṭhārasahi buddhadhammehi samannāgatena abhidhamme aṭṭhārasahi vibhaṅgehi paṭimaṇḍitaṁ
anya-e0906n:108_2: dutiyaṁ vibhaṅgappakaraṇaṁ desetvā tadanantaraṁ dhātukathaṁ nāma tatiyaṁ pakaraṇaṁ kathaṁ vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:109_1: tatiyaṁ bhante dhātukathaṁ nāma abhidhammapiṭakaṁ “saṅgaho asaṅgaho,
anya-e0906n:109_14: vippayuttena saṅgahitaṁ asaṅgahita”nti evamādinā pañca mātikāyo paṭhamaṁ nikkhipitvā saṅgahāsaṅgahādīhi
anya-e0906n:109_15: cuddasahi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:111_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā sabbadhātukusalena abhidhammapiṭake tatiyaṁ dhātukathāpakaraṇaṁ desetvā tadanantaraṁ
anya-e0906n:112_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante catutthaṁ puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṁ “cha paññattiyo khandhapaññatti āyatanapaññatti
anya-e0906n:112_6: Ettāvatā khandhānaṁ khandhapaññattī”ti evamādinā khandhāyatanadhātusaccaindriyapaññattiyo saṁkhittena
anya-e0906n:114_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā sabbaparamatthapaññattidhammakusalena abhidhammapiṭake catutthaṁ puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṁ
anya-e0906n:114_2: desetvā tadanantaraṁ pañcamaṁ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṁ kathaṁ desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:115_1: sabbaparamatthapaññattidhammakusalena bhante bhagavatā loke aggapuggalena abhidhammapiṭake catutthaṁ
anya-e0906n:115_2: puggalapaññattippakaraṇaṁ desetvā tadanantaraṁ kathāvatthudesanāya vāre sampatte “anāgate mama sāvako
anya-e0906n:115_3: moggaliputtatissatthero nāma uppannaṁ sāsanamalaṁ sodhetvā tatiyasaṅgītiṁ karonto bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe
anya-e0906n:115_4: nisinno sakavāde pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṁ samodhānetvā,
anya-e0906n:115_5: imaṁ pakaraṇaṁ bhājessatī”ti tassokāsaṁ karontena puggalavāre aṭṭhamukhā vādayuttiṁ ādiṁ katvā sabbakathāmaggesu
anya-e0906n:115_6: asampuṇṇabhāṇavāratthāya tantiyā mātikā nikkhepamattena pañcamaṁ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṁ saṁkhepato desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:116_1: adhunā pākaṭaṁ panāvuso vitthāraṁ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṁ kadā kena kattha kathañca vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:117_1: taṁ kho bhante bhagavato nayamukhaṁ nissāya āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena tatiyasaṁgītikāle
anya-e0906n:117_2: pāṭaliputte asokārāme saṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassānaṁ samāgame bhagavatā dinnanayavasena tathāgatena ṭhapitamātikaṁ
anya-e0906n:117_3: vibhajantena sakavāde pañcasuttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṁ āharitvā idaṁ paravādamathanaṁ
anya-e0906n:117_4: adhunā pākaṭaṁ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:118_1: kati āvuso tattha kathāyo tena āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:119_1: tattha bhante vācanāmaggato dve ca satāni sattavīsati ca kathāyo āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:121_1: kathañcāvuso tattha paṭhamā puggalakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:122_5: Ājānāhi niggahaṁ hañci puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena,
anya-e0906n:122_6: tena vata re vattabbe “yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
anya-e0906n:122_8: Yaṁ tattha vadesi “vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
anya-e0906n:122_11: micchāti evamādinā bhante tattha paṭhamā puggalakathā pañca bhāṇavāramattāya tantiyā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena
anya-e0906n:124_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso kathāvatthuppakaraṇe dutiyavagge dutiyā aññāṇakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena
anya-e0906n:125_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe dutiyavagge dutiyā aññāṇakathā “atthi arahato aññāṇanti, āmantā.
anya-e0906n:125_2: Atthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti,
anya-e0906n:125_4: Natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānivaraṇanti, āmantā.
anya-e0906n:125_5: Hañci natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0906n:125_6: no ca vata re vattabbe “atthi arahato aññāṇa”nti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā bhāsitā.
anya-e0906n:127_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe tatiyavagge ekādasamā asaññakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena
anya-e0906n:128_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe tatiyavagge ekādasamā asaññakathā “asaññasattesu saññā atthīti, āmantā.
anya-e0906n:128_2: Saññābhavo saññāgati saññāsattāvāso saññāsaṁsāro saññāyoni saññattabhāvapaṭilābhoti,
anya-e0906n:128_3: na hevaṁ vattabbe”ti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:130_0: Saññābhavo saññāgati saññāsattāvāso saññāsaṁsāro saññāyoni saññattabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:132_0: Nanu asaññabhavo asaññagati asaññasattāvāso asaññasaṁsāro asaññayoni asaññattabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:133_0: Hañci asaññabhavo asaññagati asaññasattāvāso asaññasaṁsāro asaññayoni asaññattabhāvapaṭilābho,
anya-e0906n:133_1: no ca vata re vattabbe asaññasattesu saññā atthi.
anya-e0906n:135_0: Pañcavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni attabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:136_0: Nanu ekavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni attabhāvapaṭilābho.
anya-e0906n:137_0: Hañci ekavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṁsāro yoni attabhāvapaṭilābho,
anya-e0906n:137_1: no ca vata re vattabbe asaññasattesu saññā atthi.
anya-e0906n:140_1: chaṭṭhavagge pana āvuso aṭṭhamā pathavīdhātu sanidassanātiādikathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:141_1: chaṭṭhavagge bhante aṭṭhamā pathavīdhātu sanidassanātiādikathā “pathavīdhātu sanidassanāti āmantā.
anya-e0906n:141_2: Rūpaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ rūpadhātu nīlaṁ pītakaṁ lohitakaṁ odātaṁ cakkhuviññeyyaṁ cakkhusmiṁ paṭihaññati cakkhussa āpāthaṁ āgacchatīti,
anya-e0906n:141_3: na hevaṁ vattabbe”ti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggali puttatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:144_0: Tena hi na vattabbaṁ cakkhuñca paṭicca pathavīdhātuñca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ.
anya-e0906n:146_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe aṭṭhamavagge dutiyā antarābhavakathā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena
anya-e0906n:147_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe aṭṭhamavagge dutiyā antarābhavakathā “atthi antarābhavoti, āmantā.
anya-e0906n:147_9: na hevaṁ vattabbe”ti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:151_0: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:153_0: Rūpabhavassa ca arūpabhavassa ca antare atthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:154_0: Kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:155_0: Hañci kāmabhavassa ca rūpabhavassa ca antare natthi antarābhavo,
anya-e0906n:155_1: no ca vata re vattabbe atthi antarābhavo.
anya-e0906n:157_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe cuddasamavagge dutiyā saḷāyatanuppattikathā āyasmatā
anya-e0906n:158_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante pañcame kathāvatthuppakaraṇe cuddasamevagge dutiyā saḷāyatanuppattikathā “saḷāyatanaṁ
anya-e0906n:158_4: na hevaṁ vattabbe”ti evamādinā āyasmatā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā.
anya-e0906n:165_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā yamakapāṭihīrāvasāne tāvatiṁsadevalokaṁ gantvā dasasahassalokadhātūhi āgamma sannisinnānaṁ
anya-e0906n:165_2: devānaṁ abhidhammadesanaṁ desentena paṭhamaṁ abhidhammapiṭake pañcappakaraṇāni desetvā tadanantaraṁ chaṭṭhaṁ
anya-e0906n:165_3: yamakappakaraṇaṁ desentena kati yamakappakaraṇāni vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:166_1: bhagavatā bhante yamassa visayātītena yamakapāṭihīrāvasāne tāvatiṁsadevalokaṁ gantvā tattha dasasahassalokadhātūhi
anya-e0906n:166_2: āgamma sannisinnānaṁ devatānaṁ abhidhammapiṭakaṁ desentena abhidhammapiṭake pūrimāni pañcappakaraṇāni
anya-e0906n:166_3: desetvā tadanantaraṁ chaṭṭhaṁ yamakappakaraṇaṁ mūlayamakaṁ khandhayamakaṁ āyatanayamakaṁ dhātuyamakaṁ
anya-e0906n:166_4: saccayamakaṁ saṅkhārayamakaṁ anusayayamakaṁ cittayamakaṁ dhammayamakaṁ indriyayamakanti dasa yamakappakaraṇāni
anya-e0906n:168_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ mūlayamakaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:169_12: sabbe te dhammā kusalāti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ mūlayamakaṁ bāvīsatiyā ca tikehi dukasatena ca vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:170_0: Ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlā.
anya-e0906n:173_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dutiyaṁ khandhayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:174_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dutiyaṁ khandhayamakaṁ “pañcakkhandhā –
anya-e0906n:174_12: viññāṇakkhandho viññāṇa”nti evamādinā bhagavatā paṇṇattivārapavattivārapariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi vārehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:176_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe tatiyaṁ āyatanayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:177_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe tatiyaṁ āyatanayamakaṁ “dvādasāyatanāni –
anya-e0906n:177_2: cakkhāyatanaṁ sotāyatanaṁ ghānāyatanaṁ jivhāyatanaṁ kāyāyatanaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ
anya-e0906n:177_7: sotāyatanaṁ sota”nti evamādinā paṇṇattivārapavattivārapariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi vārehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:179_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu catutthaṁ dhātuyamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:180_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu catutthaṁ dhātuyamakaṁ “aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo –
anya-e0906n:180_2: cakkhudhātu sotadhātu ghānadhātu jivhādhātu kāyadhātu rūpadhātu saddadhātu gandhadhātu rasadhātu phoṭṭhabbadhātu
anya-e0906n:180_3: cakkhuviññāṇadhātu sotaviññāṇadhātu ghānaviññāṇadhātu jivhāviññāṇadhātu kāyaviññāṇadhātu manodhātu manoviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0906n:180_4: dhammadhātū”ti evamādinā bhagavatā paṇṇattivārapavattivārapariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi mahāvārehi vitthārato
anya-e0906n:182_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu pañcamaṁ saccayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:183_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu pañcamaṁ saccayamakaṁ “cattāri saccāni –
anya-e0906n:183_10: maggasaccaṁ maggo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:185_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu chaṭṭhaṁ saṅkhārayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:186_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu chaṭṭhaṁ saṅkhārayamakaṁ “tayo saṅkhārā –
anya-e0906n:186_6: saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhāro ṭhapetvā vitakkavicāre sabbepi cittasampayuttakā dhammā cittasaṅkhāro”ti
anya-e0906n:186_7: evamādinā bhagavatā paṇṇattivārapavattivārapariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi mahāvārehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:188_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu sattamaṁ anusayayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:189_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu sattamaṁ anusayayamakaṁ “satta anusayā –
anya-e0906n:189_2: kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayo.
anya-e0906n:189_4: kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsu ettha kāmarāgānusayo anusetī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā uppattiṭṭhānavāra anusayavāra
anya-e0906n:189_5: sānusayavāra pajahanavāra pariññāvāra pahīnavāra uppajjanavāra dhātuvārasaṅkhātehi aṭṭhahi mahāvārehi
anya-e0906n:191_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu aṭṭhamaṁ cittayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:192_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu aṭṭhamaṁ cittayamakaṁ “yassa cittaṁ uppajjati na nirujjhati,
anya-e0906n:192_3: Yassa vā pana cittaṁ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati,
anya-e0906n:192_4: tassa cittaṁ uppajjati na nirujjhatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā suddhacittasāmaññasuttantacittamissakavisesaabhidhammacittamissakavisesa-
anya-e0906n:192_5: saṅkhātehi tīhi mahānayeti vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:194_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu navamaṁ dhammayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:195_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu navamaṁ dhammayamakaṁ “kusalā kusalā dhammā,
anya-e0906n:195_6: abyākatā dhammā abyākatā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā paṇṇattivārapavattivārapariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi mahāvārehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:197_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu dasamaṁ indriyayamakaṁ bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:198_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante chaṭṭhe yamakappakaraṇe dasasu yamakesu dasamaṁ indriyayamakaṁ “bāvīsatindriyāni –
anya-e0906n:198_2: cakkhundriyaṁ sotindriyaṁ ghānindriyaṁ jivhindriyaṁ kāyindriyaṁ itthindriyaṁ purisindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ
anya-e0906n:198_3: manindriyaṁ sukhindriyaṁ dukkhindriyaṁ somanassindriyaṁ domanassindriyaṁ upekkhindriyaṁ saddhindriyaṁ
anya-e0906n:198_4: vīriyindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ aññindriyaṁ aññātāvindriya”nti evamādinā
anya-e0906n:198_5: bhagavatā paṇṇattivāra pavattivāra pariññāvārasaṅkhātehi tīhi mahāvārehi vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:200_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaatītavāro bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:201_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaatītavāro “yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjitta,
anya-e0906n:203_1: abhidhammapiṭake āvuso indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaanāgatavāro bhagavatā kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:204_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante indriyayamake tīsu mahāvāresu pavattivāre uppādaanāgatavāro “yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjissati,
anya-e0906n:204_12: itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca uppajjissati kāyindriyañca uppajjissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:205_3: ye ca purisā eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjissati,
anya-e0906n:205_5: itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca uppajjissati itthindriyañca uppajjissati.
anya-e0906n:206_3: yā ca itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti,
anya-e0906n:206_6: Itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca uppajjissati purisindriyañca uppajjissati.
anya-e0906n:207_2: yā itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti,
anya-e0906n:207_5: Itaresaṁ tesaṁ itthindriyañca uppajjissati purisindriyañca uppajjissati.
anya-e0906n:209_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena abhisambuddhakālato sattamavasse manussaloke
anya-e0906n:209_2: yamakapāṭihīraṁ dassetvā tadanantaraṁ tāvatiṁsadevalokaṁ gantvā tattha paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ sannisīditvā
anya-e0906n:209_3: dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma sannisinnānaṁ devānaṁ abhidhammadesanaṁ desentena yāva yamakappakaraṇā
anya-e0906n:209_4: purimāni cha abhidhammappakaraṇāni desetvā tadanantaraṁ kiṁnāma pakaraṇaṁ desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:210_1: tena bhante bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena abhisambuddhakālato sattame vasse manussaloke
anya-e0906n:210_2: sāvatthiyaṁ kaṇḍambamūle yamakapāṭihīraṁ dassetvā tadanantaraṁ tāvatiṁsadevalokaṁ gantvā tattha paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ
anya-e0906n:210_3: sannipatitvā dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgamma sannisinnānaṁ devānaṁ abhidhammadesanaṁ desentena purimāni
anya-e0906n:210_4: cha abhidhammappakaraṇāni desetvā tadanantaraṁ anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānaṁ nāma sattamaṁ mahāpakaraṇaṁ desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:211_0: Pucchā – taṁ panetaṁ āvuso paṭṭhānaṁ kenaṭṭhena paṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:212_1: taṁ panetaṁ bhante paṭṭhānaṁ nānappakārapaccayaṭṭhena vibhajanaṭṭhena paṭṭhitaṭṭhena ca paṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0906n:213_0: Pucchā – tañcāvuso bhagavatā paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇaṁ desentena katihi vārehi vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
anya-e0906n:214_1: taṁ kho bhante bhagavatā paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇaṁ desentena mātikānikkhepavārasaṅkhāto paccayuddeso paccayaniddeso
anya-e0906n:215_0: Pucchā – tesu āvuso vāresu paṭhame mātikānikkhepavāre paccayuddesavāro bhagavatā kathaṁ desito.
anya-e0906n:216_1: tesu bhante dvīsu paricchedavāresu paṭhame mātikānikkhepavāre paccayuddese hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccayo
anya-e0906n:216_2: adhipatipaccayo anantarapaccayo samanantarapaccayo sahajātapaccayo aññamaññapaccayo nissayapaccayo…pe…
anya-e0906n:216_4: Evaṁ kho bhante bhagavatā vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:217_0: Pucchā – tadanantaraṁ pana āvuso paccayaniddesavāro bhagavatā kathaṁ vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:218_2: hetū hetusampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:218_4: rūpārammaṇaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:218_8: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:218_9: Rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:218_10: Sabbe dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:218_11: Yaṁ yaṁ dhammaṁ ārabbha ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā,
anya-e0906n:218_12: te te dhammā tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:219_2: sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattame mahāpakaraṇe dvīsu padhānavāresu dutiye mahāvāre kati ṭhānāni vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:220_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe dvīsu padhānaparicchedavāresu
anya-e0906n:220_3: tathā dhammapaccanīye dhammānulomapaccanīye dhammapaccanīyānulometi catuvīsati paṭṭhānāni bhagavatā vibhajitvā desitāni.
anya-e0906n:222_1: tesupi āvuso catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatitikā bhagavatā katihi vārehi vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:223_1: tesu bhante catuvīsatiyā mahāpaṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatitikā paṭiccavāro sahajātavāro
anya-e0906n:223_2: paccayavāro nissayavāro saṁsaṭṭhavāro sampayuttavāro pañhāvāroti sattahi sattahi vārehi vibhajitvā bhagavatā desitā.
anya-e0906n:225_1: tesu cāvuso dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu paṭhamo paṭiccamahāvāro bhagavatā kathaṁ vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:226_1: tesu bhante dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu paṭhamo paṭiccamahāvāro siyā kusalaṁ
anya-e0906n:226_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:226_3: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:226_4: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:226_5: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalā ca abyākatā ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:226_6: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:226_7: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo ca akusalo ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:226_8: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo ca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ hetupaccayā”ti evamādinā pucchāvārena ca.
anya-e0906n:226_9: “Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:226_10: Kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:226_13: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:226_15: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:226_16: Kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
anya-e0906n:226_17: tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
anya-e0906n:226_18: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa”nti evamādinā vissajjanā vissajjanāvārena ca.
anya-e0906n:226_35: avigate navā”ti evamādinā saṅkhyāvārena ca bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:227_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:229_2: sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:229_3: dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu dutiyo sahajātavāro kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:230_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante anantanayapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne
anya-e0906n:230_2: dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu dutiyo sahajātāvāro “kusalaṁ dhammaṁ sahajāto
anya-e0906n:230_4: kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ sahajātā tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:230_7: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ sahajāto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:230_9: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ sahajāto kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:230_10: kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ sahajātā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
anya-e0906n:230_11: tayo khandhe sahajāto eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
anya-e0906n:230_12: dve khandhe cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpa”nti evamādinā vissajjanāvārena ca.
anya-e0906n:230_16: anantare samanantare tīṇī”ti evamādinā saṅkhyāvārena ca vācanāmaggato dvīhi vārehi paṭimaṇḍitvā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:232_2: sammāsambuddhena paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:232_3: tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu tatiyo paccayavāro kathaṁ vibhajitvā vitthārena desito.
anya-e0906n:233_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:233_2: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne bāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu
anya-e0906n:233_3: tatiyo paccayavāro “siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:233_4: siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:233_5: siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti evamādinā pucchāvārena ca.
anya-e0906n:233_6: “Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā,
anya-e0906n:233_7: kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:233_9: dve khandhe paccayā dve khandhā”ti evamādinā vissajjanāvārena ca.
anya-e0906n:233_16: Paccayānuloma paccaya paccaniya paccayānuloma paccanīya paccaya paccanīyānulomasaṅkhātehi catūhi nayehi vibhajitvā bhagavatā desito.
anya-e0906n:234_0: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:234_1: Kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā,
anya-e0906n:236_2: sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattasu mahāpakaraṇesu sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu
anya-e0906n:236_3: paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattamo pañhāvāro
anya-e0906n:237_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:237_2: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu
anya-e0906n:237_3: sattamo pañhāvāro “siyā kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:237_4: Siyā kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:237_5: Siyā kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā pucchāvārena ca.
anya-e0906n:237_7: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:237_8: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:237_9: kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā vissajjanāvārena ca “hetuyā satta,
anya-e0906n:237_26: catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:238_0: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:238_1: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:238_2: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:238_3: kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:238_4: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:238_5: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo ….
anya-e0906n:241_2: sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu
anya-e0906n:241_3: paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre
anya-e0906n:241_4: pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu vissajjanāvāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṁ vitthārena
anya-e0906n:242_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:242_2: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu
anya-e0906n:242_3: sattame pañhāvāre paccayānulomapaccayapaccanīya paccayānuloma paccanīyapaccaya paccayanīyānulomasaṅkhātesu
anya-e0906n:242_4: catūsu nayesu paṭhame paccayānulomanaye pucchāvāravissajjanāvārasaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu tīsupi vāresu dutiye
anya-e0906n:242_5: vissajjanāvāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:242_6: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:242_7: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:242_8: Kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:242_9: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:242_10: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:243_2: kusalā hetū sampayattakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:243_3: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:243_4: kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
anya-e0906n:243_5: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:243_6: kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo”.
anya-e0906n:245_2: sammāsambuddhena abhidhammapiṭake sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā paṭṭhānesu
anya-e0906n:245_3: paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu sattame pañhāvāre
anya-e0906n:245_4: catūsu nayesu paṭhame paccayānulomanaye pucchāvissajjanāsaṅkhyāvārasaṅkhātesu tīsu vāresu dutiye vissajjanāvāre
anya-e0906n:245_5: hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu catuvīsatiyā vibhaṅgesu dutiyo ārammaṇapaccayavibhaṅgo kathaṁ vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0906n:246_1: abhidhammapiṭake bhante sattasu pakaraṇesu sattame anantanayasamantapaṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe catuvīsatiyā
anya-e0906n:246_2: paṭṭhānesu paṭhame dhammānulomatikapaṭṭhāne dvāvīsatiyā tikesu paṭhame kusalattike sattasu mahāvāresu
anya-e0906n:246_3: sattame pañhāvāre catūsu nayesu paṭhame paccayānulomanaye tīsu ca vāresu dutiye vibhaṅgavāre hetupaccayavibhaṅgādīsu
anya-e0906n:246_4: catuvīsatiyā vibhaṅgesu dutiyo ārammaṇapaccayavibhaṅgo “kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo,
anya-e0906n:246_5: dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati,
anya-e0906n:246_11: sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā kusalaṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,
anya-e0906n:246_19: anāgataṁsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti evamādinā bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desito.

anya-e0906n:265_4: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. Sahajātā,
anya-e0906n:265_6: Sahajātā–kusalā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.

anya-e0906n:277_2: paṭhamaṁ kusalattikaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā tadanantaraṁ avasesā vedanāttikādayo ekavīsatitikā kathaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā desitā.
anya-e0906n:278_2: paṭhamaṁ kusalattikaṁ vitthārato vibhajitvā tadanantaraṁ avasesā vedanāttikādayo ekavīsatitikā “sukhāya
anya-e0906n:278_3: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:278_4: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,

anya-e0906n:278_8: Vipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
anya-e0906n:278_9: Vipākaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā,

anya-e0906n:285_2: tikapaṭṭhānādīsu chasu antogadhapaṭṭhānesu paṭhamaṁ tikapaṭṭhānañca dutiyaṁ dukapaṭṭhānañca vibhajitvā

anya-e0906n:289_4: Akusalābyākataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca akusalābyākatā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.

anya-e0906n:289_9: Tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.
anya-e0906n:289_10: Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.

anya-e0906n:289_17: ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.

anya-e0906n:292_7: Dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ.

anya-e0906n:292_12: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

anya-e0906n:292_18: sattahi sattahi mahāvārehi ekekasmiñca mahāvāre catūhi catūhi nayehi bhagavatā vitthārato vibhajitvā desitaṁ.
